products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Unilux PVC Blackout White Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £10.04 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Give your bathroom or kitchen a modern makeover with the Unilux PVC Blackout White Roller Blind. This roller blind is made from moisture resistant PVC and is guaranteed to give your space a fresh feel thanks to its contemporary design and crisp white finish. In addition, the blackout material will provide the required peace and privacy.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX0908 Fabric Colour: White Material: Fiberglass core laminated with PVC layered coating Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

A durable, moisture resistant and long lasting collection that is available in a range of stunning shades. This crisp white vertical blind is very durable and the perfect choice for your bathroom or kitchen as it is moisture resistant and fresh.

products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout White Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Unilux PVC Blackout White Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra in White. Made to measure from £34.52 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Unilux PVC Blackout roof blinds come in our most popular colour options - a great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. 
 
This option comes with sleek, modern Aluminium framework. 
 
This flame retardant fabric has an fibreglass core and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction.

products.title: Unilux White (Moisture Resistant)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Unilux White (Moisture Resistant) Bathroom Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Bathroom Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 500mm Max Drop: 3500mm
 	Fabric Composition: PVC
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Unilux PVC Blackout White Electric Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £135.74 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A durable, moisture resistant and long lasting collection that is available in a range of stunning shades.  
 
This crisp white roller blind is very durable and the perfect choice for your bathroom or kitchen as it is moisture resistant and fresh. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for difficult to reach windows.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX0908 Fabric Colour: White Material: Fiberglass core laminated with PVC layered coating Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
